description: Anthony Romero has been working out at this gym for the past 6 months, and for the last two or three weeks there's this guy that has been giving him the eye, or so it seems. Feeling his way around makes Devin even more horny, so Anthony plunges his cock deep inside of Devin and thrusts with reckless abandon, removing the blindfold and then using it to tie Devin's hands behind his back. Bound and fucked, Devin is ready to explode, so Anthony unties him just in time for Devin to stroke his cock into a cum spewing geyser pole. Sure this won't be the last time Devin finds himself all tied up at the gym.Enjoy!
title: BLIND LUST
